name: Ghost Marine Shooter: 3D FPS
description:
Ghost Marine Shooter gives the best shooter game experience in a 3D simulated battlefield. Be the ultimate shooter as part of an elite commando task force. This is your chance to become a warfare expert sharpshooter with one of the best shooter game. The town is under attack by your deadly rivals who belong to killer ops.

Ghost Marine Shooter revolves around the story of a gun shooter commando who is part of a warfare task force that perform special ops in modern battlefield. His rivals wage war in the town but the commando with his killer instincts and sharpshooter skills will save the town from the rival’s squad.

FEATURES:
• Complete First person shooting
• Realistic Shooting game
• Different Deadly Weapons to choose from
• Experience Thrill in 3D
• Eye-Catching HD Graphics
• Single Player Campaign
• Extreme Reflexes play
• Excellent Artificial Intelligence
• Smooth and Easy Controls
• Free forever
• Full Action packed music and sound effects
• No In App Purchases
• No Wi-Fi required
and much more…
